sentences.en: As to whether MoUs recover, that depends on their mettle.
sentences.cn: 至于宇宙主宰者能否复原，这取决于他们的勇气。

sentences.en: But as the crowd roared for the Italian, Li showed her mettle and held firm.
sentences.cn: 然而，当观众为意大利人呐喊时，李娜展现了她的勇气，稳住了阵脚。

sentences.en: Each and every one of these soldiers has proved his mettle.
sentences.cn: 这些战士个个都是好样的.

sentences.en: For both sides, it's the first real test of their mettle this season.
sentences.cn: 对于双方而言，这是本赛季对他们的能力的首次真正考验。

sentences.en: He has shown his captaincy mettle over the past few years.
sentences.cn: 过去几年里他已经显示出担任队长职务的素质.

sentences.en: He was put on his mettle.
sentences.cn: 他受到考验.

sentences.en: It takes a man of mettle to keep a family safe and comfortable in this troubled world.
sentences.cn: 在这个动荡不安的世界，只有勇敢的男人才能给家人带来安全和舒适。

sentences.en: Learns sensitively thinks , by its knowledge, mettle, tenacious Cheng Qiming.
sentences.cn: 敏学好思, 以其学识 、 胆略 、 坚韧成其名.

sentences.en: My Side of the Mountain, by Jean Craighead George. This is a story about a boy who decides to live in the woods, to test his mettle and do something different.
sentences.cn: 珍·克雷黑德·乔治所写的《山居岁月》——故事所写的是一个男孩决定住在丛林里来测试他的勇气，做些不同凡响的事情。

sentences.en: Now, everyone will be testing you, your mettle, your resolve.
sentences.cn: 现在，每个人都会考验你，你的勇气、你的决心。

sentences.en: She showed her mettle by winning in spite of her handicap.
sentences.cn: 那匹雌马尽管增加了负重而仍能获胜,可见很有耐力.

sentences.en: The added competition keeps them on their mettle.
sentences.cn: 加赛让他们全力以赴。

sentences.en: The next game will be a real test of their mettle.
sentences.cn: 下一场比赛就要看他们的拼搏精神了。

sentences.en: The next race will put him on his mettle.
sentences.cn: 下次赛跑他就要全力以赴了.

sentences.en: The runner fell, but he showed his mettle by continuing in the race.
sentences.cn: 短跑运动员摔倒了, 但仍坚持不懈,体现出了他的毅力.

sentences.en: These were spirited men, men of character and mettle.
sentences.cn: 这些都是有骨气的人, 有特殊性格和气质的人.

sentences.en: They mistook the mettle of their sons.
sentences.cn: 她们误解了儿子的大胆.

sentences.en: We'll have to be on our mettle to win the game.
sentences.cn: 要在这场比赛中获胜,我们得准备尽最大的努力.

sentences.en: When the seas are in turmoil , heroes are on their mettle.
sentences.cn: 沧海横流,方显出英雄本色.

sentences.en: Your inner mettle may not be easily altered, but with the right tool kit, some aspects of personality may be works in progress.
sentences.cn: 你内心的气质也许不会轻易改变，然而如果有了一些正确的方法，一些个性将会不经意间地改变。

phrases.tran_cn: 奋发：准备接受挑战并尽最大努力
（严峻形势）使奋发，激励某人战胜困难

trans.tran_cn: 内在的气质，精神，勇气，气概
trans.tran_en: courage and determination to do something even when it is very difficult
